name: DeFi²
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
The first and only multi-layered incoming generating platform, encompassing traditional DeFi layers, along with a makeshift income multiplying dApp, giving users a brand-new way to BOOST their APY whilst staking $DFX

 DeFi² combines parts of the traditional DaaS (Defi-as-a-service) model with its own native staking pool, as well as the first ever fully integrated Twitter/Web3 dApp for its holders, allowing additional and lucrative ways for multiplying returns through the form of APY BOOSTS.
DeFi² also removes the need of active fund management for each user by creating opportunities to diversify holdings via its Treasury, focusing primarily on maximizing staking and farming yields.
